rows.label: tev020401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev020401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Anna about data probe installation sites.

rows.label: tev020401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev020401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Anna if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev020401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Anna why NLA is only half-built.

rows.label: tev020401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Anna about the construction of NLA.

rows.label: tev020401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Anna about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020401_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Anna about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh? Are you a new recruit as well?
I just finished up with my training, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0002
rows.name:
For our training, we left through this gate and
surveyed western Primordia, but it looks like yours is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh wow! Yours is in the complete opposite direction!
Yeah, you'll get there a lot faster by leaving through
the gate in the administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Be careful out there. You never know what sorts of
indigens you'll run into.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0005
rows.name:
And if you DO run into trouble, escape by sprinting to
safety. I mean, how lame would it be to get yourself
killed while you're still in training? Em-BARR-assing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm searching for a Pathfinder team to join,
but I can't decide which one. I feel like I've been
agonizing over this decision forever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0009
rows.name:
I mean, the responsibilities of BLADE are too much for
a single new recruit. Plus, going on long missions
without anyone to talk to would drive me crazy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0010
rows.name:
So I've been checking out the various options.
Robert's team is looking pretty good...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0011
rows.name:
As team captain, Robert seems like he's well-prepared
and a good planner. I feel like I'd be safe putting my
life in his hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Also, he seems nice and clean, which is important.
I want someone who lets me bathe during mission
downtimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0020
rows.name: ...What? Do you have amnesia or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Well, the Habitat—as this residential unit was known—
was built after we fled Earth, WHILE the White Whale
was in flight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0022
rows.name:
But then the stupid xenoform attack forced us to make
a crash landing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0023
rows.name:
The still-unfinished Habitat unit ended up coming
down right here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0024
rows.name:
Now that we no longer have access to the Whale's
construction unit, we'll have to finish the job with
human manpower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0025
rows.name: So let's work hard and get the job done right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0040
rows.name:
It's pretty incredible that after sustaining an attack of
that severity, none of the buildings in New LA seem
to be heavily damaged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0041
rows.name:
From the looks of the city, you'd never guess that we'd
been attacked in the first place![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0042
rows.name:
I was kind of curious, so I asked Ciska about it.
She knows everything about everything, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0043
rows.name:
She said that New LA was designed to look like a
classic American town.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Also, the buildings are made out of steel and coated
with an earthquake-resistant resin that can even
withstand the impact of artillery shells![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG0045
rows.name:
THAT'S what I call the last stronghold of humanity!
This place can even keep us safe from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1046
rows.name:
Ahhhh... Nothing beats taking a nice long bath to
unwind and relax.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1047
rows.name:
It was nice of Robert to be so patient with me.
I'll keep working hard on the next mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1048
rows.name:
Aren't baths the greatest? I don't care what corner
of the galaxy humanity will have to flee to next—
as long as they have baths, I'm set![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1049
rows.name: I actually suggested to Kan'tonam that he start bathing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1050
rows.name:
But he said it would make his skin swell up.
I guess all Orpheans must be that way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1051
rows.name:
None of them will ever know the joys of a good bath.
Those poor, poor bastards...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1060
rows.name:
I am now the chairperson of the New LA Hot Springs
Association![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1061
rows.name:
So far the only other member is Ciska, who shares
my love of long baths and natural spring spas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1062
rows.name:
But I swear that we will accomplish our secret plan of
one day building a public hot springs in New LA.
I hope we can count on your behind-the-scenes support![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020401_MSG1063
rows.name:
Our motto is "Springs before Other Things."
For New LA will never be complete so long
as it lacks a decent hot springs spa![ST:wait ]
